description: Personalized Thai massage treatments in Berlin by Lamai. Effective relief for chronic pain, tension, and stress. Traditional techniques tailored to your needs.

layout.title: Authentic Thai Massage Treatments
layout.description: Experience therapeutic treatments tailored to your individual needs—from deep pain relief to complete relaxation.

services.title: Proven Therapies for Lasting Relief
services.text: Each massage is personally tailored by Lamai to your specific concerns and tension patterns. From chronic pain to stress relief—experience the difference of individual, therapeutic care.

items.heading: Traditional Thai Massage
items.p: Experience our signature oil-free treatment focusing on the entire body as a whole, including muscles, joints, and energy lines. Through rhythmic pressure and stretching techniques, this ancient practice promotes deep relaxation and relieves chronic tension throughout your body.

items.heading: Prana Thai Back Massage
items.p: Therapeutic pressure techniques target your back muscles to increase oxygen flow and release accumulated toxins from stressed areas. This focused treatment effectively relieves shoulder, neck, and back tension while promoting natural healing and improved circulation.

items.heading: Marma Aroma Oil Massage
items.p: Gentle massage techniques combine aromatic oils with targeted marma point stimulation to harmonize your body's energy flow. This soothing treatment relieves tension, creates a sense of lightness, and provides ideal stress relief through mindful touch and therapeutic oils.

items.heading: Aroma Oil Massage
items.p: Immerse yourself in a calming aromatherapy experience where essential oils are absorbed through your skin and inhaled for maximum benefit. This mindfulness-focused treatment promotes deep relaxation, balances emotions, and leaves you feeling centered and refreshed.

items.heading: Hot Stone Massage
items.p: Warm basalt stones glide across your body with gentle, soothing pressure to melt away deep-seated tension. The healing warmth enhances circulation, promotes natural detoxification, and leaves you with a refreshed, rejuvenated sensation. Perfect for profound stress reduction and comfort.

items.heading: Herbal Compress Massage
items.p: Steaming herbal compresses infused with aromatic Thai herbs glide softly over your skin, releasing their therapeutic properties. The warmth opens pores, improves circulation, and relieves muscular tension while essential oils and herbs gently calm, revitalize, and restore your body's natural balance.

items.heading: Foot Reflexology Massage
items.p: Therapeutic massage of reflex zones on your feet that correspond to organs and systems throughout your body. Through targeted pressure and gentle stretching, tensions are released, circulation and lymph flow improve, and your entire organism is harmonized and balanced.

items.heading: Sport Massage
items.p: Specialized treatment for athletes targeting muscles, tendons, and ligaments through stretching and focused pressure techniques. This massage improves circulation, stimulates muscle metabolism, supports post-workout recovery, enhances performance, and helps prevent injuries. Ideal before or after training sessions.

items.heading: Couples Massage
items.p: Share a relaxing escape as two experienced therapists work simultaneously on your back, shoulders, neck, and legs. Choose between gentle calming techniques or aromatic oil massage. This harmonious treatment promotes relaxation, reduces stress, and strengthens your shared connection.
